00053 /**
00054  * @brief Enumeration of Global reset status.
00055  */
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058   RSTCU_FLAG_SYSRST = 0,
00059   RSTCU_FLAG_EXTRST,
00060   RSTCU_FLAG_WDTRST,
00061   RSTCU_FLAG_PORST
00062 } RSTCU_RSTF_TypeDef;
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * @brief Definition of initial structure of peripheral reset.
00066  */
00067 typedef union
00068 {
00069   struct
00070   {
00071     /*  Definitions of AHB peripheral reset                                                                 */
00072     unsigned long PDMA       :1;    // Bit 0
00073     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 1
00074     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 2
00075     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 3
00076     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 4
00077     unsigned long USBD       :1;    // Bit 5
00078     unsigned long EBI        :1;    // Bit 6
00079     unsigned long CRC        :1;    // Bit 7
00080 
00081     unsigned long PA         :1;    // Bit 8
00082     unsigned long PB         :1;    // Bit 9
00083     unsigned long PC         :1;    // Bit 10
00084     unsigned long PD         :1;    // Bit 11
00085     unsigned long PE         :1;    // Bit 12
00086     unsigned long PF         :1;    // Bit 13
00087     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 14
00088     unsigned long AES        :1;    // Bit 15
00089 
00090     #ifdef USE_HT32F65230_40
00091     unsigned long DIV        :1;    // Bit 16
00092     #else
00093     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 16
00094     #endif
00095     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 17
00096     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 18
00097     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 19
00098     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 20
00099     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 21
00100     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 22
00101     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 23
00102 
00103     #ifndef USE_HT32F65230_40
00104     unsigned long DIV        :1;    // Bit 24
00105     #else
00106     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 24
00107     #endif
00108     unsigned long QSPI       :1;    // Bit 25
00109     unsigned long RF         :1;    // Bit 26
00110     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 27
00111     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 28
00112     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 29
00113     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 30
00114     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 31
00115 
00116     /*  Definitions of APB peripheral 0 reset                                                               */
00117     unsigned long I2C0       :1;    // Bit 0
00118     unsigned long I2C1       :1;    // Bit 1
00119     unsigned long I2C2       :1;    // Bit 2
00120     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 3
00121     unsigned long SPI0       :1;    // Bit 4
00122     unsigned long SPI1       :1;    // Bit 5
00123     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 6
00124     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 7
00125 
00126     unsigned long USART0     :1;    // Bit 8
00127     unsigned long USART1     :1;    // Bit 9
00128     unsigned long UART0      :1;    // Bit 10
00129     unsigned long UART1      :1;    // Bit 11
00130     unsigned long UART2      :1;    // Bit 12
00131     unsigned long UART3      :1;    // Bit 13
00132     unsigned long AFIO       :1;    // Bit 14
00133     unsigned long EXTI       :1;    // Bit 15
00134 
00135     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 16
00136     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 17
00137     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 18
00138     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 19
00139     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 20
00140     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 21
00141     unsigned long SLED0      :1;    // Bit 22
00142     unsigned long SLED1      :1;    // Bit 23
00143 
00144     unsigned long SCI0       :1;    // Bit 24
00145     unsigned long I2S        :1;    // Bit 25
00146     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 26
00147     unsigned long SCI1       :1;    // Bit 27
00148     unsigned long MIDI       :1;    // Bit 28
00149     unsigned long LEDC       :1;    // Bit 29
00150     unsigned long CAN0       :1;    // Bit 30
00151     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 31
00152 
00153     /* Definitions of APB peripheral 1 reset                                                                */
00154     unsigned long MCTM0      :1;    // Bit 0
00155     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 1
00156     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 2
00157     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 3
00158     unsigned long WDT        :1;    // Bit 4
00159     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 5
00160     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 6
00161     unsigned long DAC1       :1;    // Bit 7
00162 
00163     unsigned long GPTM0      :1;    // Bit 8
00164     unsigned long GPTM1      :1;    // Bit 9
00165     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 10
00166     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 11
00167     unsigned long PWM0       :1;    // Bit 12
00168     unsigned long PWM1       :1;    // Bit 13
00169     unsigned long PWM2       :1;    // Bit 14
00170     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 15
00171 
00172     unsigned long BFTM0      :1;    // Bit 16
00173     unsigned long BFTM1      :1;    // Bit 17
00174     unsigned long TKEY       :1;    // Bit 18
00175     unsigned long LCD        :1;    // Bit 19
00176     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 20
00177     unsigned long DAC0       :1;    // Bit 21
00178     unsigned long CMP        :1;    // Bit 22
00179     unsigned long OPA        :1;    // Bit 23
00180 
00181     unsigned long ADC0       :1;    // Bit 24
00182     unsigned long ADC1       :1;    // Bit 25
00183     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 26
00184     unsigned long            :1;    // Bit 27
00185     unsigned long SCTM0      :1;    // Bit 28
00186     unsigned long SCTM1      :1;    // Bit 29
00187     unsigned long SCTM2      :1;    // Bit 30
00188     unsigned long SCTM3      :1;    // Bit 31
00189   } Bit;
00190   u32 Reg[3];
00191 } RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef;

00205                                    (FLAG == RSTCU_FLAG_EXTRST) || \
00206                                    (FLAG == RSTCU_FLAG_WDTRST) || \
00207                                    (FLAG == RSTCU_FLAG_PORST))
